id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.



*See also: [NTC Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ntc.html#configuration-variables)*

sensor.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The sensor to read the resistance values from to convert to temperature readings.



*See also: [NTC Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ntc.html#configuration-variables)*

calibration.docs:
**float**: The calibration parameters of the sensor - see above for more details.



*See also: [NTC Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ntc.html#configuration-variables)*

CONFIG_SCHEMA.docs:
The `ntc` platform is a helper sensor that allows you to convert resistance readings from a NTC thermistor to temperature readings.

*See also: [NTC Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ntc.html#ntc-sensor)*
